metric.name: Client Registrations
metric.description: Number of clients that have registered for updates

metric.name: Client Registration Time
metric.description: Total time spent doing client registrations

metric.name: Compiled Query Used Count
metric.description: Number of times compiled queries are used

metric.name: Cq Processing Time
metric.description: Total time spent by the cache client notifier processing cqs

metric.name: Durable Reconnection Count
metric.description: Number of times the same durable client connects to the server

metric.name: Event Processing Time
metric.description: Total time spent by the cache client notifier processing events

metric.name: Events
metric.description: Number of events processed by the cache client notifier

metric.name: Events Enqueued While Client Away Count
metric.description: Number of events enqueued in queue for a durable client

metric.name: Queue Dropped Count
metric.description: Number of times client queue for a particular durable client is dropped
